Reviews.Title: The "Price Is Right"
Reviews.Author: mg
Reviews.Content: This item conveys all movements as they occur, not in segments as other wireless camera-monitors by other companies. There appears to be a problem with overheating inside the monitor in previous GE monitor/camera packages I purchased which will eventually affect video performance,color, or will simply shut down for good. The latest purchase from Amazon has the best color and clarity of all previous cam/monitors purchased and well worth the money if you are securiity conscious in these days no matter where you live. Just make sure the product has plenty ventilation, dont drop it, and keep it away from moisture.

Reviews.Title: Workes great
Reviews.Author: Bobby D
Reviews.Content: Works Great and was ease to install.  Only problem the  screen on the receiver is way too small.  I know the picture will be a lot better after I hook up to VCR or TV.  I ordered the battery for the camera as it will not work if we have a power outage.
